description: Learn how to use Excel in 1 hour! This course is a very short and comprehensive course on how to master the basics of the best spreadsheet software to date. This course is optimized by John Bura who has been teaching since 2002 and programming since 1997. You get to learn the basics of how Excel works and you get some fantastic knowledge about how computers work. If you have some previous excel experience, then this course might not be for you. Enroll in this course. It is the best course for complete beginners
title: 1 hour excel for absolute beginners
